column6: connectivity and captive portal checks, requests SSDP device desc from Sony TV (only model name) gets ssdp unpn data such as service lists and control addresses, send metrics to 1st party
Requests information from tp link devices via broadcast and TCP, recv over UDP/TCP
Echo dot communication, most likely time sync, https://media.defcon.org/DEF%20CON%2026/DEF%20CON%2026%20presentations/DEFCON-26-Wu-HuiYu-and-Qian-Wenxiang-Breaking-Smart-Speakers-Updated.pdf
Encrypted comms between echo dot, cert says alexa
